definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: He graduated from Shandong University and Shanghai University , now works at CBN.
sentences.chinese: 畢業於山東大學和上海大學，現就職於第一財經日報。

sentences.english: I graduated from Shanghai University and majored in International Trade.
sentences.chinese: 我畢業於上海大學國際貿易系。

sentences.english: Presently for Shanghai University article institute file department associate professor, master lives teacher.
sentences.chinese: 現爲上海大學文學院檔案學系副教授，碩士生導師。

sentences.english: He served as the secretary of the special committee of the CPC at Shanghai University. "…"
sentences.chinese: “他在上海大學任中共特委書記”的英文表達，謝謝。

sentences.english: I was born in 1972 in Shanghai. I graduated from Shanghai University.
sentences.chinese: 我1972年出生在上海，我畢業於上海大學。

sentences.english: Xiao Ming has been admitted by Shanghai University to study genetic engineering.
sentences.chinese: 小明考入了上海大學的遺傳工程專業。

sentences.english: Leng Hong is currently a Pluralistic Professor at the Fine Art College of Shanghai University.
sentences.chinese: 目前冷宏任上海大學藝術學院的兼職教授。

sentences.english: He graduated from the department of Chinese painting, School of Art, Shanghai University.
sentences.chinese: 畢業於上海大學美術學院中國畫系。

sentences.english: My name is Hou Lihong, college student from shanghai university, I'm a junior in university now.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字是候利紅，來自上海大學的大三學生。
